about_the_game:
Ducklings have been kidnapped, and you are an ANGRY Mama Duck!

Dungeons and Ducklings is a roguelite adorable Duckventure. Rescue your baby ducklings at all costs!

An evil Lich amasses power in secret, hidden from the nearby peaceful kingdom. Your poor ducklings have fallen through a sewer grate, into the Lich's domain. What evil purpose could the Lich have for these cute little ducklings. It is time for the arrogant Lich to learn an important lesson. Nothing can stop the power of a Mama Duck looking for her ducklings!
detailed_description:
Ducklings have been kidnapped, and you are an ANGRY Mama Duck!

Dungeons and Ducklings is a roguelite adorable Duckventure. Rescue your baby ducklings at all costs!

An evil Lich amasses power in secret, hidden from the nearby peaceful kingdom. Your poor ducklings have fallen through a sewer grate, into the Lich's domain. What evil purpose could the Lich have for these cute little ducklings. It is time for the arrogant Lich to learn an important lesson. Nothing can stop the power of a Mama Duck looking for her ducklings!
name: Dungeons and Ducklings Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: 64bit Intel compatible Dual Core CPU.
  • Graphics: DX11 compliant graphics card.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: 64bit Intel compatible Dual Core CPU.
  • Graphics: DX11 compliant graphics card.
